import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{ServicesService}from'./AdminServices';import LoadingSpinner from'../../components/shared/LoadingSpinner';import ErrorMessage from'../../components/shared/ErrorMessage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ServicesManagement=()=>{const[services,setServices]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[selectedService,setSelectedService]=useState(null);const[formData,setFormData]=useState({title:'',description:'',icon:'',featured:false});const[isEditing,setIsEditing]=useState(false);// Load all services on component mount
useEffect(()=>{const loadServices=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const data=await ServicesService.getAllServices();setServices(data);setLoading(false);}catch(err){setError(err.message||'Failed to load services');setLoading(false);}};loadServices();},[]);// Handle form input changes
const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value,type,checked}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:type==='checkbox'?checked:value});};// Handle form submission
const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{setLoading(true);if(isEditing&&selectedService){// Update existing service
const updatedService=await ServicesService.updateService(selectedService._id,formData);setServices(services.map(service=>service._id===updatedService._id?updatedService:service));setIsEditing(false);setSelectedService(null);}else{// Create new service
const newService=await ServicesService.createService(formData);setServices([...services,newService]);}// Reset form
setFormData({title:'',description:'',icon:'',featured:false});setLoading(false);}catch(error){toast.error(error.message||'Something went wrong');setLoading(false);}};// Handle edit service
const handleEdit=service=>{setSelectedService(service);setFormData({title:service.title,description:service.description,icon:service.icon,featured:service.featured});setIsEditing(true);};// Handle delete service
const handleDelete=async id=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this service?')){try{setLoading(true);await ServicesService.deleteService(id);setServices(services.filter(service=>service._id!==id));setLoading(false);}catch(error){toast.error(error.message||'Failed to delete service');setLoading(false);}}};// Cancel editing
const handleCancel=()=>{setIsEditing(false);setSelectedService(null);setFormData({title:'',description:'',icon:'',featured:false});};// List of common icons
